headline: Halliburton Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call
summary: HOUSTON, June 20, 2025--Halliburton Company (NYSE: HAL) will host a conference call on Tuesday, July 22, 2025, to discuss its second quarter 2025 financial results. The call will begin at 8:00 a.m. CT (9:00 a.m. ET).

headline: Halliburton and Petronas collaborate to speed up time to first oil
summary: Petronas will adopt Halliburton's DecisionSpace 365 and Unified Ensemble Modelling for geoscience operations.

raw.headline: Halliburton and Petronas collaborate to speed up time to first oil
raw.summary: Petronas will adopt Halliburton's DecisionSpace 365 and Unified Ensemble Modelling for geoscience operations.

headline: Halliburton announces strategic collaboration with PETRONAS Carigali Sdn. Bhd.
summary: Halliburton (HAL) announced a strategic collaboration with PETRONAS Carigali Sdn. Bhd. to advance subsurface modeling and reservoir management. “As part of the collaboration, PETRONAS Carigali Sdn. Bhd. will deploy Halliburton Landmark’s DecisionSpace 365 Geosciences Suite and Unified Ensemble Modeling solutions with the objective to unify exploration and development workflows and accelerate time to first oil… This collaboration follows a comprehensive benchmarking of PETRONAS’ greenfield and ma
